decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Existing Ground Floor Plan YG 01Rev 01, Existing First Floor Plan YG 02 Rev 01, Existing Roof Plan YG 03 Rev 01, Existing Front Elevation YG 04 Rev 01, Existing Rear Elevation YG 05 Rev 01, Existing Side Elevation YG 06 Rev 01, Proposed Ground Floor Plan YG 07_Rev Rev 04, Proposed First Floor Plan YG 08_Rev Rev 04, Proposed Loft Floor Plan YG 09_Rev Rev 04, Proposed Roof Plan YG 10_Rev Rev 04, Proposed Front Elevation YG 11_Rev Rev 04, Proposed Side Elevation YG 12_Rev Rev 04, Proposed Rear Elevation YG 13_Rev Rev 04
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The solar PV equipment shall not protrude more than 0.2 metres beyond the plane of the roof slope when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the roof slope. The panels shall not project above the highest part of the roof.

Reason: To ensure that the equipment would not become a dominant feature within the street scene or harm local character, in accordance with Policies 7B and LV7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear infill extension; insertion of 4 ground floor windows to side elevation; first floor side/rear extension incorporating two Juliet balconies; roof extension to rear (main) roofslope, side roof dormer extension and part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope, installation of 14 solar panels and installation of one roof light to front roof slope.
